mdRecord.dcterms:title: U.S. Army nurse's uniform from World War II
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: The uniform was worn by Ruth Beery, chief nurse of the U.S. Army 8th Evacuation Hospital unit during World War II. This green uniform is composed of a button-down jacket and cargo pants; jacket: size small, 2R13, Ruth Beery stitched inside, nursing pin attached to lapel; pants: size small, 2R13, Ruth Beery stitched inside.
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Uniforms
World War, 1939-1945
United States. Army. Evacuation Hospital, 8th
